participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Emma loves spending time outdoors and is passionate about her future career in medicine.
participant_1.background: I hike and camp with my friends for exercise and to enjoy nature. I want to be a doctor. I am a grown woman. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. I have trouble getting along with family.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Sarah enjoys writing about her experiences and values her time spent with her pets.
participant_2.background: I love my pets because they are always there to greet me when I come home from work. I work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work. I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs. I write about my travels and experiences. Everyday after work I buy my dog a dog biscuit.

content.text: Hey whats up?
I'm doing well, what about you?
Not bad. I just got back from hiking with some friends.
Oh that sounds fun! Where did you hike?
We hiked in the Toronto area. It was pretty nice and not too busy.
That's great! I love to hike too. I live in the suburbs so I have a lot of trails close by.
I'm jealous! I live in the city so it's not as easy to find trails.
Well you're welcome to come hike with me sometime! I always love hiking with new people.
I'd love that! I'll have to let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good! In the meantime, I'll be sure to save you a dog biscuit.
Haha thanks! I love dog biscuits!
Me too! They're my favorite way to say hello to my dogs.
I bet your dogs are so happy to see you every day.
They are! They always greet me at the door and wag their tails excitedly.
That's so cute! I wish my dog was that excited to see me.
You just have to give him some treats! That's what I do.
I'll have to try that!
Good luck! I hope he likes them!
Me too! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Anytime!
